data.title: Official Athletics Website
data.meta_description: Greg Aycock (31) Defensive                                                                Back - 2004 - Special teams stalwart ... posted seven tackles on th...
data.text: 2004 - Special teams stalwart ... posted seven tackles on the season ... had one in each of the last three games ... also posted a stop against Kansas State and SMU ... made two tackles against TCU. 2003 - Played in all 13 games ... had seven tackles on the season ... saw some action on defense, but was primarily a special teams players ... played on kickoff coverage, kickoff return and punt return teams ... Navy - had two tackles in the bowl win over the Middies ... Texas - one tackle against the Horns ... Missouri - logged a tackle ... Oklahoma State - made one stop ... Mississippi - had a tackle at Ole Miss ... N.C. State - logged first tackle of the season at N.C. State. 2002 - Scout team member ... redshirt season. High School - Cooper High School in Lubbock, Texas ... all-district linebacker three seasons ... all-district running back one season ... All-South Plains for three years and team defensive MVP and All-City three seasons ... All-City, All-South Plains and all-state outfielder on the baseball team ... batted .400 senior season and set the school record for doubles ... baseball team won district title and advanced to regional semifinals three years ... High School Coaches: John Windham and Terry Baxter. Personal - Gregory Davis Aycock ... born April 24, 1982, in Lubbock, Texas ... son of Cindy Hardin and Gary Aycock ... has an older brother and sister, Ryan and Shannon ... Ryan was a member of the Red Raider football team from 1999-2003 and ranks among the school[apos]s top 10 in career interceptions ... uncle, Chad Moore, played football at Tech ... uncles Charlie Davis, Donald Davis and Ricky Davis all played collegiately at McMurry ... Ricky Davis went on to play for the Denver Broncos ... grandfather, Ernie Davis, also played at McMurry ... enjoys team roping, fishing, hunting and snow skiing ... majoring in agricultural communications.
